siteMetadata.title: Trafikito - monitor output of any command
siteMetadata.author: Lukas Liesis

markdownRemark.excerpt: A workspace is a place where you can add several servers in order to have all of them on the same list. You can add members to the workspace and work together.
markdownRemark.html:
A workspace is a place where you can add several servers in order to have all of them on the same list. You can add members to the workspace and work together.

All pricing plans are for workspaces, please read more on the pricing page: Price
